sentences.en: And this guy has got to be the best vocalist.
sentences.cn: 况且,这个人已经成为最好的歌星.

sentences.en: He and Carla Torgerson take turns as the band's lead vocalist.
sentences.cn: 他和卡拉·托格森轮流担当乐队的主唱。

sentences.en: Her son had a calling to become a vocalist.
sentences.cn: 她儿子有一股热望,要成为一名歌唱家.

sentences.en: I think David Cook is a great vocalist.
sentences.cn: 我认为大卫·库克是个很出色的歌手.

sentences.en: If I was auditioning for a vocalist, let me put it this way, he wouldn't get to sing in my band.
sentences.cn: 如果我来面试歌手的话，请允许我这样说，他不会进入我的乐团来唱歌的。

sentences.en: In appreciation of the enthusiastic applause, vocalist sang an encore.
sentences.cn: 为了答谢热情的掌声, 那个声乐家再唱一曲.

sentences.en: Lin Junqing is an excellent doctor, voice experts and vocalist.
sentences.cn: 林俊卿是位出色地医生 、 嗓音专家、声乐家.

sentences.en: Mr. Smith is an excellent vocalist.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生是位优秀的声乐家.

sentences.en: Mr. Steffen is an excellent vocalist.
sentences.cn: 斯蒂芬先生是位优秀的声乐家.

sentences.en: She is a gifted composer and arranger, as well as an extraordinary vocalist.
sentences.cn: 她是一位天才作曲家和安排, 以及非凡的歌手.
听众要求歌唱家再演唱一次.

sentences.en: The pianist had to tailor his style to suit the vocalist's distinctive voice.
sentences.cn: 钢琴手不得不改变风格以配合歌手独特的嗓音.

sentences.en: Vocalist is the most welcome jazz program for lots of audiences.
sentences.cn: 爵士歌手一向是最受爵士乐迷喜爱的演出内容之一.

sentences.en: Vocalist: Is he a singer, too?
sentences.cn: 歌手: 他也是个歌手 吗 ?

sentences.en: With the addition of bass vocalist Lance Bass, things came together.
sentences.cn: 贝司手兼演唱兰斯·巴斯加盟后, 便万事俱备了.

trans.tran_en: someone who sings popular songs, especially with a band
